title: Aspect Refillable 3 xBBQ LIGHTERS Assorted Colour BBQ Gas Lighter | Use for Kitchen, Barbecue, Candles, Camping, Cooking, BBQs, Fireworks
features: Easy-to-Use and Refillable: Enjoy effortless ignition and a continuous flame with our user-friendly, refillable BBQ lighter. Perfect for kitchen, barbecue, camping, and cooking applications.

Multi-Purpose Long-Reach Design - This Pack of 3 Lighters Perfect for lighting BBQs, candles, gas stoves, fireworks, and campfires. The extended nozzle keeps your hand safely away from the flame, making it ideal for indoor and outdoor use.

Refillable & Durable Build - Designed for long-term use, these gas lighters are refillable and built with high-quality materials. They’re ideal for daily kitchen use, outdoor adventures, and lighting candles.

Child Safety Lock for Secure Use - Each lighter is equipped with a child-safety lock feature, offering extra protection to prevent accidental ignition around kids and pets. Whether lighting candles, fireworks, or outdoor campfires, this reliable tool keeps you safe.

Windproof Flame & Adjustable Control - Wind-resistant flame ensures reliable lighting in outdoor conditions. With adjustable flame control, The long reach and extended handle keep your hands safely away from the flame, making it perfect for lighting candles, fireplaces, and hard to reach gas stoves.
description: Product Description Features Lighters With Locking System Top Quality Refillable BBQ Lighters Extra Long reach measures approx. 27cm long Safety lock Refillable & Adjustable Flame Lighters Visible Fuel Level Window Aspect BBQ Lighters Assorted Colours Will Be Sent Long reach lighters are suitable to light up Barbecues, gas stoves, candles, Cookers, Fireworks, and camping. Lighters are refillable and easy to refill with a given Clipper gas bottle. Lighter contains adjustable flame, child safety lock and easy ignition trigger. The gas indicator window on the lighter helps you to see the level of gas inside the lighter and you can refill lighters accordingly before it will completely finish. Read all warnings before using this product. No lighter is child-proof. There is no substitute for proper adult supervision. Flick it Safely. Keep away from children. Extra Long reach measures approx. 27cm long Whether you’re grilling at home, getting ready to warm up by the fireplace, or lighting candles for a special occasion, The utility lighters are there to light the way. Multi-purpose Lighters are the essential tools for safe and convenient indoor and outdoor lighting needs. These high-performing, long-lasting lighters feature a durable wand to keep hands away from fire, have a child-resistant mechanism, and are 100% quality inspected. Safety lock: A safety mechanism of a utility lighter that includes a locking mechanism and a child-resistant safety button. In order to maintain a flame the safety button must be continuously activated. Refillable & Adjustable Flame Lighters: The BBQ utility lighter is refillable. Easily adjust the flame height by using fuel adjustment valve. "Our gas lighter will ship WITHOUT butane due to the safety regulations". Visible Fuel Level Window: Every lighters design with a unique visible butane function. Easy to remind the user when the lighter needs to refill and check the progress of butane filling.
